DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare visual performance two soft bifocal contact lens .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Two Soft Bifocal Contact Lenses
DOC.criteria: The subject must 35 70 year age . The subject must presbyopic symptom already wear presbyopic contact lens correction . The subject 's spherical equivalent distance refraction must range 1.00 6.00 9.00 10.00 eye . Refractive cylinder must 0.75 D eye . The subject must ADD power +0.75D +2.50D eye . The subject must best correct visual acuity 20/203 good eye The subject 's must least 20/30distance vision OU study contact lenses . The subject must agree comfortable vision prior dispense study lenses The subject must adapt soft contact lens wearer eye . The subject must appear able willing adhere instruction set forth clinical protocol . The subject must read sign STATEMENT OF INFORMED CONSENT provide copy form . Ocular systemic allergy disease may interfere contact lens wear . Systemic disease , autoimmune disease use medication , may interfere contact lens wear . Clinically significant ( grade 3 4 ) corneal edema , corneal vascularization , corneal stain abnormality cornea , may contraindicate contact lens wear Clinically significant ( grade 3 4 ) tarsal abnormality might interfere contact lens wear . Any ocular infection . Any corneal distortion result previous hard rigid gas permeable contact lens wear . Pregnancy lactation Any infectious disease ( e.g. , hepatitis , tuberculosis ) immunosuppressive disease ( e.g. , HIV ) . History diabetes History binocular vision abnormality strabismus
